biotools.summary: A suite of tools that includes: PSIPRED, a protein structure prediction server; GenTHREADER, for genomic protein fold recognition; MEMSAT2, for transmembrane protein structure prediction; GTD, the genomic threading database; DISOPRED, a dynamic disorder prediction server; DomPred, a domain prediction server; and COPS, for the comparison of protein structure classifications. UCL web portal has been updated to include a fully automated 3-D modeling pipeline, BioSerf.

bioschemas.name: UCL Servers
